thread.title: MJ in the desert
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by MJ in the desert

author: MJ in the desert
title: MJ in the desert
text: Fast shipping, good price, thorough reviews, great product After a lot of research, we got our first vape from here. We got the Arizer Air. It's performing exactly as expected. We're very happy! Also enjoyed the freebies, esp. the airtight canister.
